verbs.description: as [ARG1: electricity] [V: fails] desperate venezuelans buy spoiled meat in a city once called the saudi arabia of venezuela for its vast oil wealth residents of maracaibo now line up to buy spoiled meat as refrigerators fa nicolás maduro maracaibo johel prieto lake maracaibo yeudis luna first republic of venezuela
